description:
Want to bring hypermedia into your web design workflow, ditching the
complexity of JSON-over-HTTP for a more RESTful approach?

Create and design your web application with `htmx <https://htmx.org>`__
and spark joy in your design process. Splash in a little `Tailwind
CSS <https://tailwindcss.com>`__, too. (*Ssshh. You're a Full-Stack
Developer now.*)
title: Web Development With A Python-backed Frontend: Featuring HTMX and Tailwind
